alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Haakon; Harding; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 03 at 12:56PM MST until December 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Haakon; Harding; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach
